name: g_to_n
description: Tests whether the tool projects a genomic variant to a non-coding DNA variant

name: c_to_g
description: Tests whether the tool projects a coding transcript variant to a genomic variant

name: n_to_g
description: Tests whether the tool projects a non coding variant to a genomic variant
comment: Sometimes this causes an error with hgvs tool

name: c_to_p
description: Tests whether the tool projects a coding transcript variant to a protein variant

name: g_to_c_delins
description: Tests whether the tool correctly project a genomic indel to a coding transcript

name: c_to_p_matching
description: Tests whether the tool projects a coding transcript variant to the correct protein variant when there are multiple protein accessions.

name: c_ins_to_dup_shift
description: Given incorrectly shifted input; parse, normalize and give the correctly 3 prime shifted output
